title: Program Soraka Invisible Silence
body: I was laning a against a Program Soraka and when she uses her silence i couldnt see it but i can hear it and the silence stats shows. After that i paid close attention to her when she silences and it doesnt happen all the time but i think it happens when she use it near/in walls it disappear. If anyone owns this  skin could you test it out to see if that what really cause it.

replies.body:
Hey DeadJokr - 

Thanks for the report! As you've mentioned, this isn't something that occurs all the time. I'm unable to reproduce this issue. :c I may suggest doing a client repair to see if a file may have been jumbled with the most recent patch. If that doesn't resolve the issue, please feel free to reach out and we can investigate further! :)
